entry.title: prosegrinder/annotatedtext: A lightweight JavaScript library for converting markup documents into an annotated text format consumable by LanguageTool.
entry.content: A lightweight JavaScript library for converting markup documents into an annotated text format consumable by LanguageTool.

entry.title: tharun-kumar-r/PopupJs: PopupJs.js - Lightweight JavaScript Popup Library PopupJs.js is a lightweight, standalone JavaScript library for creating customizable popups and modal dialogs. It is designed for ease of use, fast performance, and flexibility without dependencies like jQuery or external frameworks.
entry.content: PopupJs.js - Lightweight JavaScript Popup Library PopupJs.js is a lightweight, standalone JavaScript library for creating customizable popups and modal dialogs. It is designed for ease of use, fast performance, and flexibility without dependencies like jQuery or external frameworks.

entry.title: jayyprajapati/code-collaboration-tool: A lightweight, browser-based code collaboration tool that allows multiple users to share their thoughts and build things together seamlessly.
entry.content: A lightweight, browser-based code collaboration tool that allows multiple users to share their thoughts and build things together seamlessly.

entry.title: tobenot/prompt-manager: A lightweight browser-side prompt word management tool that helps users create, edit, categorize and export prompt word templates. Data is stored locally in the browser without the need for a backend server. 一个轻量级的浏览器端提示词管理工具，帮助用户创建、编辑、分类和导出提示词模板。数据存储在浏览器本地，无需后端服务器。
entry.content: A lightweight browser-side prompt word management tool that helps users create, edit, categorize and export prompt word templates. Data is stored locally in the browser without the need for a backend server. 一个轻量级的浏览器端提示词管理工具，帮助用户创建、编辑、分类和导出提示词模板。数据存储在浏览器本地，无需后端服务器。

entry.title: neuroborus/ethers-tools: ethers-tools is a zero-dependencies lightweight JavaScript/TypeScript library built on top of ethers.js designed to simplify smart contract interactions and multicall3 aggregation on the Ethereum blockchain and compatible EVM networks.
entry.content: ethers-tools is a zero-dependencies lightweight JavaScript/TypeScript library built on top of ethers.js designed to simplify smart contract interactions and multicall3 aggregation on the Ethereum blockchain and compatible EVM networks.

entry.title: TarekRaafat/eleva: A minimalist, lightweight, pure vanilla JavaScript frontend runtime framework.
entry.content: A minimalist, lightweight, pure vanilla JavaScript frontend runtime framework.

entry.title: shokuninstudio/Ollamadore-64: Ollamadore 64 is a private ultra lightweight frontend for Ollama that weighs well under 64 kilobytes on disk.
entry.content: Ollamadore 64 is a private ultra lightweight frontend for Ollama that weighs well under 64 kilobytes on disk.

entry.title: moneymessgame/AIrine: AIrine is a decentralized local node system designed for Android devices in technically limited regions. Each node runs a lightweight Express.js server that exposes an open API, enabling local access to essential AI tools and data without an internet connection. A Next.js client leverages WebRTC to interact with AI agents
entry.content: AIrine is a decentralized local node system designed for Android devices in technically limited regions. Each node runs a lightweight Express.js server that exposes an open API, enabling local access to essential AI tools and data without an internet connection. A Next.js client leverages WebRTC to interact with AI agents

entry.title: sadaigm/ai-as-agent: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.
entry.content: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.

entry.title: Maksim-Manojlovic/Image-Optimizer: A lightweight and efficient image optimization tool built with JavaScript and Node.js/Express.js. Reduce image file sizes without losing quality
entry.content: A lightweight and efficient image optimization tool built with JavaScript and Node.js/Express.js. Reduce image file sizes without losing quality

entry.title: prajesh8484/WeatherU: A lightweight and responsive weather application built using React.js.
entry.content: A lightweight and responsive weather application built using React.js.

entry.content: VueDir is a lightweight library of custom directives for Vue.js.

entry.content: A lightweight Node.js private proxy registry

entry.content: A lightweight and amazing WYSIWYG JavaScript editor under 10kB

entry.content: A lightweight tool designed to quickly create and customize small templates for various applications

entry.title: valorisa/ntp-ts-client: A lightweight TypeScript application built on Node.js to fetch the current date and time from an NTP server. Features include Jest for robust unit testing, Docker integration for seamless deployment, and compatibility with Alpine Linux.
entry.content: A lightweight TypeScript application built on Node.js to fetch the current date and time from an NTP server. Features include Jest for robust unit testing, Docker integration for seamless deployment, and compatibility with Alpine Linux.

entry.title: shreyas-segu/broke-bot: Lightweight Telegram bot designed to track daily expenses and log them into Google Sheets
entry.content: Lightweight Telegram bot designed to track daily expenses and log them into Google Sheets

entry.title: srinjoyray/quadtree-geo: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript library for geographic coordinate encoding using quadtree. This implementation provides methods for encoding/decoding coordinates, finding neighbors, calculating bounding boxes, and performing proximity-based searches.
entry.content: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript library for geographic coordinate encoding using quadtree. This implementation provides methods for encoding/decoding coordinates, finding neighbors, calculating bounding boxes, and performing proximity-based searches.

entry.content: fast & lightweight self-hosted messenger
